promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young basic wolf fire-type wearing a dark crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrofox, a chibi young basic wolf fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: ember. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word wolf or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, wolf-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Pyrofox is a feisty, desert-dwelling chibi. It loves to bask in the sun and puff out its chest as it plays in the sand. Beware its Ember attack!
